titles.title: Critical Mineral Consistency Act of 2025
Critical Mineral Consistency Act of 2025
A bill to amend the Energy Act of 2020 to include critical materials in the definition of critical mineral, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.activity: Markup By, Hearings By (Full Committee), Referred To
